attributes.action: Proposed changes to rise immigration fees by 25% in 2016-17 is "discriminatory"
attributes.background: Last month government has proposed changes for 2016-17 to rise immigration fee by 25% for settlement and nationality applications while on the other hand only 2% increase for visit, study and work visas which is not only unfair but total discrimination with peoples who made contributions

rejection.details: You could start a new petition calling on the Government or Parliament to set the fees at a defined amount for all applications.
